meanings.sent1: The muscleman lifted heavy weights at the gym.
meanings.sent2: The muscleman flexed his biceps to show his strength.
meanings.sent3: The muscleman's muscles were so big, he got stuck in the doorway!
meanings.sent4: His arms were like tree trunks, a true muscleman.
meanings.sent5: The muscleman's muscles rippled with power as he lifted the barbell.

meanings.definition: A man who performs feats of strength or athleticism.
meanings.sent1: The circus muscleman lifted the elephant effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The muscleman amazed the crowd with his incredible stunts.
meanings.sent3: The muscleman juggled dumbbells and bowling balls at the same time!
meanings.sent4: He was a real-life superhero, a muscleman in action.
meanings.sent5: The muscleman's agility and strength were unmatched in the competition.
